item.description: Big Deals! Valentine's Day Pizza Shop Watercolor Card
item.content:encoded:
Valentine’s Day Pizza Shop Watercolor Card

Big Deals! Valentine’s Day Pizza Shop Watercolor Card – Valentines Day Cards Valentine’s Day Pizza Shop Watercolor Card products are in stock Valentine’s Day Pizza Shop Watercolor Card Try to read more firstSend someone you are missing a special note with this card featuring an original watercolor painting of a quaint, old town pizza parlor shop. Valentino’s Pizza, created with Valentine’s Day in mind, features window displays of a stone oven pizza restaurant offering heart shaped pizza for their February special. A quiet scene, this little winter storefront is closed for now, and only inhabited by two funny groundhogs enjoying a slice. A truly unique card for Valentine’s, this little bit of mail was created as the February page of a calendar and doubles as frameable artwork. Blank on the inside for writing a note to friends and family. Price:$4.17

Valentine’s Day Pizza Shop Watercolor Card
